mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Logs (requestUrl, createDT, host, userAgent, referer, cookie, userNo, clientIP, attr1, attr2, attr3, attr4) VALUES(#{requestUrl}, NOW(), #{host}, #{user-agent}, #{referer}, #{cookie}, #{userNo}, #{clientIP}, #{attr1}, #{attr2}, #{attr3}, #{attr4})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, requestUrl, createDT, userNo, clientIP, attr1, attr2 , code, codeName , categoryCode, categoryName FROM ( SELECT requestUrl, createDT, userNo, clientIP, attr1, attr2 , T2.code, T2.codeName , T3.categoryCode, T3.categoryName , @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM +1 AS ROWNUM FROM Logs T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CodeTB T2 ON T1.attr1 = T2.code LEFT OUTER JOIN Category T3 ON T1.attr2 = T3.categoryCode WHERE 1=1 AND userNo = #{userNo} AND requestUrl IN ('/auction/avatarCharacterSetSearch' , '/auction/avatarShowroomSearch') AND (@ROWNUM:=0) = 0 -- 페이징을 위한 rownum 초기화 ) A ORDER BY createDT DESC -- 역순으로 가져옴 LIMIT #{start} , #{pageCnt}
